name: Sightwaves
description:
This was our submission for Global Game Jam 2017, the first game jam that John, Will and Dan ever went to, before Tim joined the team, at the Jam Site of the University of Lincoln.

The Theme for this year was 'Waves', so we came came up with the idea of the player not being able to see through normal means, instead seeing the world through sound. So as a player you need to make noise in order to see the world and make your way through abandoned structures and puzzles to find your way back home.
